idea-plugin.name: Java Bean 2 TS Interface
idea-plugin.description:
Adds support for converting a java bean file to typescript interface file
Usage instructions : After this plugin is installed, right click on a java bean file or a java entity file, click a menu item called '(→ . →) java bean to typescript interface', choose a folder to save the ts interface file, then open the folder and check the result file
